error.signature: ERROR: pip's dependency resolver does not currently consider all the packages
error.regex: ERROR: pip's dependency resolver does not currently consider

verdict.summary: Dependency version constraints are mutually exclusive across installed packages.

dead_ends.why_fails: Forces installation but doesn't resolve the underlying conflict

dead_ends.action: Pin all packages to exact versions from a working machine
dead_ends.why_fails: Breaks on different platforms or Python versions

workarounds.action: Use pip-compile from pip-tools to find a compatible resolution
Create a fresh virtual environment and install from scratch

leads_to.condition: Conflict prevents installation so module remains missing

preceded_by.condition: Tried alternative package that conflicts with existing deps

frequently_confused_with.distinction: No matching distribution means package not found; dependency conflict means packages found but versions are incompatible
